title: The Brute
description: “The Brute by Tarrah Anders is an amazing spin on a classic fairytale. The story of Bella and Ben had me hooked from the very beginning and kept me hooked to the very end.”“If you are after a quick steamy read with so much heart and soul to the story then The Brute is a must read for you. You wont be able to stop yourself from falling in love with Ben and Bella.”Benjamin Adams.He's an ass! But why? People have said that once upon a time he was charming and one of the friendliest men around. After a series of events, he became the owner of his father's company and was no longer the nice young man that he used to be. He was a beast! Then she comes along and thaws him from his iciness. She breathes new life into him, but revenge has its way of wanting to destroy him again.
author: Tarrah Anders
